attributes.action: e-commerce physically based in UK to offer Royal mail rates and courier rates.
attributes.additional_details: A Postcode Penalty survey found 63% of online retailers charge extra delivery for certain parts of the UK and 34% said delivery would take longer for those who live on islands. Royal Mail charges the same no matter where you are located.
attributes.background: Homes in the Highlands and Islands of Scotland, Northern Ireland and Isle of Man are normally only offered one rate. This results in much higher  costs to THESE AREAS  or being refused any delivery at all. Around 69% on line dealers do not offer delivery by Royal Mail, which is the same to anywhere.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition as you seem to be asking the e-commerce companies to change their postage costs rather than asking the UK Government or Parliament to take action.
